articles.description: Henderson, who was number two behind De Gea at Old Trafford last season but did not play a single Premier League game, joined newly-promoted Nottingham Forest on loan in July.
articles.content:
Fans have torn into Manchester United for 'letting go of the wrong goalkeeper' after contrasting displays from David de Gea and Dean Henderson this weekend.

articles.title: Bruno Fernandes is the 'WORST possible team-mate' and 'gets away with murder' says Gabby Agbonlahor - Daily Mail
articles.description: Agbonlahor compared Fernandes to former United star Paul Pogba, who was regularly criticised during his time at Old Trafford for failing to give his all in the United shirt.
articles.content:
Gabriel Agbonlahor has savagely criticised Bruno Fernandes for his poor work rate as Manchester United suffered a second consecutive Premier League defeat in a 4-0 loss to Brentford on Saturday.

articles.title: Maurizio Sarri piles pressure on Jose Mourinho's Roma claiming second would be a 'disappointment' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Roma have made sevral big-name signings over the summer including Paulo Dybala and Georginio Wijnaldum, with Mourinho looking to build on his team's sixth-placed finish last season.
articles.content:
